mapper.sql: id, num, pid, name, DEPT_ID, tips, version
mapper.select: SELECT r.id,r.NUM, r.PID, r.NAME, r.DEPT_ID,r.TIPS, r.CREATE_TIME,r.UPDATE_TIME,r.VERSION FROM KTF_role r, KTF_user_role ur WHERE ur.user_id= #{id} AND ur.role_Id = r.id

SELECT r.id,r.NUM, r.PID, r.NAME, r.DEPT_ID,r.TIPS, r.CREATE_TIME,r.UPDATE_TIME,r.VERSION,r.checked, (CASE WHEN (SELECT ur.role_id FROM KTF_user_role ur WHERE ur.user_id= #{id} AND ur.role_Id = r.id) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS checked FROM KTF_role r

SELECT name FROM KTF_role WHERE id IN
#{item}

select
from KTF_role
where name like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%')
order by NUM
select id, pId, name, (case when (pId = 0 or pId is null) then 1 else 0 end) open from KTF_role

SELECT r.id "id", pId "pId", NAME AS "name", (CASE WHEN (pId = 0 OR pId IS NULL) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) "open", (CASE WHEN (r1.ID = 0 OR r1.ID IS NULL) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) "checked" FROM KTF_role r LEFT JOIN (SELECT ID FROM KTF_role WHERE ID IN
#{i} ) r1 ON r.ID = r1.ID ORDER BY pId, num ASC
